member.name: M:FluentEvents.Azure.SignalR.EventPipelineConfiguratorExtensions.ThenIsSentToAllAzureSignalRUsers``1(FluentEvents.Config.EventPipelineConfigurator{``0},System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a module to the current pipeline that publishes the event to all the users connected to the configured Azure SignalR Service.
member.param: The for the pipeline being configured.
The SignalR hub name. The default value is the entity name with the "Hub" suffix (Eg. TSourceHub).
The SignalR hub method name. The default value is the current event field name.
member.returns: The same instance so that multiple calls can be chained.

member.summary: Adds a module to the current pipeline that publishes the event to some users connected to the configured Azure SignalR Service.
member.param: The for the pipeline being configured.
A that returns the ids of the users that should receive the event.
The SignalR hub name. The default value is the entity name with the "Hub" suffix (Eg. TSourceHub).
The SignalR hub method name. The default value is the current event field name.
member.returns: The same instance so that multiple calls can be chained.
